alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 3:40AM MST until March 09 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will be possible across the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley
